name: Code-Switching: False Parallels
description:
Will you defy their racist assertions, or perform an "acceptable" version of blackness to avoid further attacks?

1 of 3 Game Segments from "Code-Switching", an interactive video and 3D game project.

Shown at:
UC Santa Cruz 2019 MFA show "Receivership".
2019 UC Santa Cruz Games Showcase winner of Social Impact Award.

Code-Switching is an interactive film and game space that explores the dynamics of how racism communicates in a society perpetually adhered to thinly-veiled racist values and policies. Using elements of deeply personal experience and historical symbolism, it works to problematize the concept of whiteness itself.
